title: Sophisticated San Francisco Escape in SoMa District with Fine Dining Restaurant & Artisan Cocktail Bar
description: See the stylish side of the Golden City with a luxurious stay at the InterContinental San Francisco, an IHG Hotel. Positioned in the heart of the bustling SoMa district, the hotel is just a short stroll from Union Square and the Museum of Modern Art. After a day of city exploration, retreat to the prestigious Luce for a taste of modern Mediterranean fine dining or head to Bar 888 for a sip of one of the bar's top-shelf spirits. For a quick bite, enjoy casual classics at Bistro 888 throughout the day.
location_description: InterContinental San Francisco, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 888 Howard Street, San Francisco, California 94103, USA
